class Solution:
    def minimumDistance(self, points: List[List[int]]) -> int:
        import sortedcontainers
        a, b, c, d = [sortedcontainers.SortedList() for _ in range(4)]
        for x, y in points:
            d1, d2, d3, d4 = -x - y, -x + y, x - y, x + y
            a.add(d1)
            b.add(d2)
            c.add(d3)
            d.add(d4)

        res = float("inf")
        for x, y in points:
            d1, d2, d3, d4 = -x - y, -x + y, x - y, x + y
            a.remove(d1)
            b.remove(d2)
            c.remove(d3)
            d.remove(d4)
            m1 = a[-1] + d[-1]
            m2 = b[-1] + c[-1]
            res = min(res, max(m1, m2))
            a.add(d1)
            b.add(d2)
            c.add(d3)
            d.add(d4)

        return res
